The sub-fund aims to do this with a higher ESG score than the Bloomberg Global Aggregate (the “Reference Benchmark”), calculated as a weighted average of the ESG score of the issuers of the sub-fund’s investments, versus the weighted average of the ESG score of the Reference Benchmark constituents.
